title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 514.6 - Incorporation by Reference
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 514.6 - Incorporation by Reference

State Regulations

The provisions of the Guiding Principles for the Review and

Approval of Clinical Review Criteria for Mental Health Services, which have
been incorporated by reference in this Part, have been filed in the Office of
the Secretary of State of the State of New York, the publication so filed being
the document entitled: Guiding Principles for the Review and Approval of

Clinical Review Criteria for Mental Health Services (Issued November 25, 2019; Revised June 15, 2022). This document incorporated by reference may be examined
at the Office of the Department of State, 99 Washington Ave., Albany, NY 12231
or obtained from the Office of Mental Health, Records Access Officer, 44

Holland Ave., Albany, NY 12229 or available on the Office of Mental Health
website. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
514.6

Adopted

New

York State Register May 15, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 20, eff. 5/15/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
